TextBlock.Text: DAZ: These new storm shelters are incredible, Thatch! I have never felt safer visiting <color=lightblue>Giant's Deep</color> in their presence!
THATCH: I feel the same way, Daz! We owe Kousa at the <color=orange>Gravity Crystal Workshop</color> much gratitude for engineering this incredible invention to keep us safe.
DAZ: Hm..? Why has the storm shelter suddenly activated? There are no cyclones near the island at the moment.
DAZ: How strange.. The storm shelters should only activate in the presence of cyclones, should they not? Could this storm shelter be defective?
THATCH: No, the issue does not seem unique to this unit alone; all the storm shelters on the island seem to have activated for some erroneous reason!

THATCH: Unfortunately, I do not know much about the mechanisms of this device.. It was not long ago we Nomai on <color=lightblue>Giant's Deep</color> were completely insulated from cyclones in the <color=orange>Looming City,</color> you see.

THATCH: When I next travel home, I shall pay a visit to the <color=orange>Gravity Crystal Workshop</color> on <color=lightblue>Brittle Hollow</color> to learn more about the storm shelter, and shed light on this issue!
